title: Valet Key Pattern in Azure pt.2
description: This is the follow-up of part one and shows you how to implement the Valet Key pattern client-side. In this blog I use angular to upload files directly into Azure BLOB Storage

title: Valet Key Pattern in Azure pt.1
description: Once in a while you run into a design pattern and think... Why didn't I start using this ages ago? The Valet Key design pattern is one of those
